nodes.text: The Battle of Roche was an early battle of the Jedi Civil War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and Darth Revan's Sith Empire. It took place following the sacking of Foerost as new battlefronts opened up across the galaxy because of the advancing Sith Empire. The Sith advanced on Roche and conquered the planet. At the highest extent of the Sith Empire, Roche remained under Imperial control.

The Battle of Roche makes its only appearance in The Essential Atlas. An exact date is not provided for the battle. The Battle of Foerost, however, is placed in 3958 BBY by the Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide.
